array.name: thunderstorm
array.item: Thunderstorm. You\'d get by if enough food is stored.

array.name: dizzle
array.item: Dizzle. You\'d want to drink. Please stay aware.

array.name: rain
array.item: Rain, rain, go away - come with dead another day.
Almost flood out there. You better sit home, drink wine with that girl you saved the other day.
That\'s how rain should look like. Rain in icy hell of zombie-apocalypse.

array.name: snow
array.item: Snowing. I\'d recommend to stay home - headhunters could find you by tracks you\'d left.
Too much snow. Better stay home, read Walking Dead.
Rain and snow - how can it become worse? Add zombies.

array.name: atmosphere
array.item: Foggy. Who knows what hides around the corner.

array.name: clear
array.item: Sky is clear - nice opportunity to look for better shelter.

array.name: clouds
array.item: Cloudy. Pilots won\'t see your smoke signal.

array.name: extreme
array.item: Very hot. Better look for shelter closer to the beach.
Kinda windy. Don\'t get sick. It\'s been months since any medication were left in the pharmacies.
Very windy. Dead won\'t be able to smell you.

array.name: additional
array.item: It\'s calm. Get some rest and watch an good zombie-movie.
Stormy. Some yacht with food and ammo might crush to the beach. Go take a look.
